title: Champion Select Jerks
body:
This just happened in our champion select

wsyydd: mid pref
iwire2: who is a beast at adc?
Quayer5: doublelift
wsyydd: imp
iwire2: in this team ....

the point is one of our team is trying to figure out where to play, the rest of us are jerks
add your champion select jerks below

replies.body: Honestly I think this will keep happening till you get master+ and main ranked because then and 99% of all other times plat down just don't give a shit.
Deft and Imp is definitely the best adc in the world right now.

Until you get to higher ranks, and this I can only hope is true, no one in normals or low ranks gives a shit. I have had numerous ranked games that players will just yell at each other and troll.

Someone called JG first? Nope, someone else is going to flat out abuse you AND take jungle just to piss you off and try to force you into another lane, even if they are last pick and first pick took jungle.
lel at you for thinking doublelift beast adc
I'm silver 2... compared to me (and over 99% of all players) doublelift is a beast.
They say explaining a joke is like a dissecting a frog. You understand it better after it's through, but in the process, the frog dies.
